00025 class PackageConfiguration:
00026         def __init__(self):
00027                 self.cfunctions = ''
00028                 self.cheaders = ''
00029                 self.optional_cfunctions = ''
00030                 self.optional_cheaders = ''
00031                 self.options = {}
00032                 self.uselibs = {}
00033                 self.modules = {}
00034 
00035         def __getattr__(self, item):
00036                 """Maps values to attributes."""
00037                 try:
00038                         return self.self.__dict__[item]
00039                 except KeyError:
00040                         raise AttributeError(item)
00041 
00042         def __setattr__(self, item, value):
00043                 """Maps attributes to values."""
00044                 if not self.self.__dict__.has_key(item):
00045                         self.self.__dict__[item] = value
00046                 elif type(value) is types.ListType:
00047                         self.self.__dict__[item] += value
00048                 elif type(value) is types.StringType:
00049                         self.self.__dict__[item] += value + ' '
00050                 else:
00051                         print "unknown type"
00052 
00053 
00054 conf = PackageConfiguration()
00055 verbose = 1
00056 
00057 # walk through available directory an see if there are any SConfigure files 
00058 if verbose: 
00059         print 'SConfigure(s) found in '
00060 for root, dirs, files in os.walk('.'):
00061 
00062         # skip svn or cvs directories 
00063         if '.svn' in root or 'CVS' in root:
00064                 continue
00065 
00066         # got one
00067         if 'SConfigure' in files:
00068                 if verbose:
00069                         print root
00070                 _file_ = open(root + os.sep + 'SConfigure', "r")
00071                 # conf is given as global object 
00072                 exec _file_
00073 
00074 # print results                 
00075 print conf.cheaders
00076 print conf.cfunctions
00077 print conf.optional_cheaders
00078 print conf.optional_cfunctions
00079 print conf.options
00080 print conf.uselibs
00081 print conf.modules
